# mirascope.core.base.stream

<ApiType type="Module" />

## Description

This module contains the base classes for streaming responses from LLMs.

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| BaseStream |  | A base class for streaming responses from LLMs. |
